name: Seamonkey Darkblue App Theme
description: App theme, customisation, toolbars, windows, options, popups, downloads, mail, preferences...
css:
/* AGENT_SHEET */
/* Created  by Antonio Ferreiro "a3cAnton" 25-03-2011 */@-moz-document url("chrome://browser/content/tabview.html"){*{color:#ccf!important;text-shadow:1px 1px 3px #000!important}* :hover{color:hsla(190,50%,65%,1)!important;text-shadow:0 0 0.8em hsla(190,50%,75%,.9),0 0 1.2em #fff!important;transition:text-shadow .3s ease!important}#content{-moz-appearance:none!important;background-color:transparent!important;background-image:url("chrome://browser/skin/newtab/noise.png"),linear-gradient(to
